summary: This document is an email exchange from February 2025 between a journalist, Daniel Bates, and an unnamed recipient. Bates references his past reporting on Jeffrey Epstein's connections to Peter Mandelson and Andrew, and proposes collaborating on a story for the Daily Mail.

persons.name: Daniel Bates
persons.context: A journalist who has reported on the Epstein story, referencing his own articles about Peter Mandelson's connections to Jeffrey Epstein and Prince Andrew. He is proposing a collaboration on a story for the Daily Mail.

persons.name: RUPURT
persons.context: Referenced as someone the email recipient is not a fan of, likely a misspelling or reference to Rupert Murdoch.

persons.name: Guy Adams
persons.context: Mentioned as a journalist who took the lead on a story about Epstein, while Daniel Bates claims to have done the leg work.

persons.name: Peter Mandelson
persons.context: A British political figure who was the subject of Daniel Bates's reporting regarding scheduled meetings with Jeffrey Epstein. Bates notes Mandelson is now in a more powerful position.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case. The email discusses his past connections and planned business ventures with Peter Mandelson and Prince Andrew.

persons.name: Andrew
persons.context: Referenced alongside Peter Mandelson in a plan by Jeffrey Epstein to make them star advisers for a new consultancy business. This is a reference to Prince Andrew, Duke of York.

persons.name: Murdoch
persons.context: Referenced as someone the email recipient is not a fan of, leading Daniel Bates to propose working with the Daily Mail instead.

connections.description: Colleagues or collaborators on reporting the Epstein story; Bates states Adams took the lead while he did the leg work.
Epstein had plans to make Mandelson a star adviser for a new consultancy business, and Mandelson had multiple dates scheduled with Epstein in his diary.
Epstein had plans to make Prince Andrew a star adviser for a new consultancy business alongside Peter Mandelson.
Bates is a journalist who has reported on Mandelson's connections to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein reporting
events.description: Journalist Daniel Bates emails an unnamed recipient, referencing his past reporting on Epstein's connections to Peter Mandelson and Prince Andrew, and proposes collaborating on a new story.

keyFacts: The document is an email from 2025, showing ongoing journalistic interest in the Epstein case years after his death.
It references Jeffrey Epstein's past plan to make Peter Mandelson and Prince Andrew 'star advisers' for a new consultancy business.
It notes that Peter Mandelson had multiple dates scheduled with Jeffrey Epstein in his diary.
The journalist, Daniel Bates, claims to have done significant leg work on Epstein stories for the Daily Mail.
